MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 08-APR-2021 11:32.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold affecting a small number of properties in the local area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of broken equipment on the overhead line network, are engineers are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm midday . We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:55am on the 8th April 2021.
